name: Space Mountain
description: A high-speed indoor roller coaster through outer space.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
description: A boat ride through pirate-infested waters with animatronic pirates.

name: It's a Small World
description: A gentle boat ride celebrating the cultures of the world with animatronic dolls.

name: The Haunted Mansion
description: A spooky tour through a haunted house with ghosts and ghouls.

name: Splash Mountain
description: A log-flume ride with a thrilling drop, soon to be reimagined as Tiana’s Bayou Adventure.

name: Millennium Falcon: Smugglers Run
description: An interactive flight simulator where you pilot the Millennium Falcon.

name: Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance
description: An immersive ride that puts you in the middle of a battle between the Resistance and the First Order.

name: Peter Pan's Flight
description: A magical flight over London and Neverland with Peter Pan.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
description: A gentle ride where you fly with Dumbo.

name: Matterhorn Bobsleds
description: A bobsled ride through the icy slopes of the Matterhorn mountain.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy – Mission: BREAKOUT!
description: A thrilling drop ride set in the Guardians of the Galaxy universe.

name: Radiator Springs Racers
description: A thrilling race through the world of Cars.

name: Incredicoaster
description: A high-speed roller coaster based on The Incredibles.

name: Web Slingers: A Spider-Man Adventure
description: An interactive ride where you help Spider-Man capture rogue Spider-Bots.
